alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Doddridge, north central Gilmer, northwestern Lewis and southwestern Harrison Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1044 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Union, or 10 miles southeast of Middlebourne, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem, West Union, New Milton, Smithburg, Alum Bridge, Blandville, Avon, Canton, Grove, Leopold, and Troy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 near mile marker 108. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 51 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
